name: Magic Takes Root
description:
IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE.

Click the little blue fullscreen icon in the bottom right of the game to enter fullscreen. <3

Fairies are expert tree-keepers (and they sell the most delicious syrup at farmers markets). This fairy's job is to help guide the tree's roots so it'll grow big and strong. Be careful not to guide your root into rocks, and of course avoid the local wildlife. The fairy has special friends underground who shower her with gifts. Be sure to say hello!

As you go deeper, you may encounter some pesky imps... Thanks to our fairy's magic, the root is protected from fire, but she herself can get badly burned.

Now go! Make the root grow as deep as it can!

Controls:

Move the root with WASD

Move the fairy with the mouse

Be careful, the root has a tendency to follow the fairy!

Made for the Ludum Dare 48 72 hour jam.
